name: Wpintl
body:
## Who we are

### USPTO Patent agents
Based mainly in the U.S., we are patent agents registered with the United States Patent and Trademark Office.
	
We have extensive patent prosecution experience across many technological fields, We have counseled numerous clients on matters concerning: patent portfolio acquisition and management; patent portfolio licenses, sales and purchases; joint development agreements; freedom to practice opinions; patentability opinions; non-infringement opinions; enforceability opinions; and employment and non-compete agreements.

We are dedicated to serve our clients to file patent applications in USPTO as well as other countries, such as China.

With our langugage skills, we can help answering patent-related questions no matter if you are based in U.S. or China.  Our service includes conducting novelty searches and providing opinions that include U.S. and China patent or non-patent literatures.

### Services
#### Against your competitors							
Our commitment to work with our clients to find the best strategies for protecting their patentable inventions, distinguishing their brands, and building their businesses to gain competitive advantages with inventive ideas.						

#### Strength your partners							
We help identify areas of your product features or portfolios to entrench partners' trust and place strategic importance over your partnership network during negotiation.						

#### Your investor							
We will help build portfolios that are valued as assets by investors						

#### Target for Growth							
focus on developing and implementing intellectual property strategies for growing businesses, particularly small and mid-size businesses, as well as with entrepreneurs.

to meeting the needs of my clients. W&P is structured to deliver the best IP services and the highest level of client satisfaction.
